thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: beth white

author: beth white
title: beth white
text: I needed a carpet cleaned. I searched online and found one from Homeadvisor. The gentleman that came out was very courteous and right on time. He had Quote: d a price over the phone based on dimensions. After he got here, there were stains he had to work extra hard on and it took longer than expected. However, he did not charge for that. He abided by his Quote: . We will use him again.
